[h1]Всемирно(нет) известный шутер от Valve[/h1]

[h1]Первый взгляд[/h1]
Half-Life-Одна из лучших, ну и пожалуй, самая хорошая для начала игры игра (Масло маслянное)
Мультиплеер+Синглплеер, ставший легендой

[h1]Разбор геймплея[/h1]
Сам шутер очень динамичный. Даже на моем стареньком пека он может вытянуть 200 FPS, если постараться, но мне сие деяние производить лень, и еще мне хватает 70FPS
Всю суть синглплеера я раскрывать не буду, так как обзоры могут читать и люди, не игравшие еще в этот шедевр.
Мультиплеер-Полная багов и веселья кровавая мясорубка: Фулл-Виолайнс, прыжки на тау-пушке и распрыжка!

[h1]Плюсы игры[/h1]

+Отличный сюжет: Игра дала начало новой религии поклонителей Гейбу
+Высокая динамичность шутера: Очень интересно бить и убегать!
+Игра, проверенная временем (19 лет мать вашу!): No Comments!
+Распрыжка: смотри ниже!
etc.

[h1]Минусы игры[/h1]

-Распрыжка: Иногда на серверах мне появлялись люди, откровенно пользующие читы и дико прыгающие. Мне это не нравится. Но есть люди, которые распрыгиваются только своим скиллом, их я уважаю.
-Графика: Низкополигональные модели, даже при HPHL, однако играть можно
-Недоантичит

Ждём Half-Life 3

Half-Life, the game where it all started. Half-Life was a revolutionary game, adding the concept of story telling combined with a Quake/Doom like FPS shooter, all with enhanced graphics and sound effects.

 Half-Life spawned many great mods like TFC, CS, DOD, and much more. These mods turned into games, that we are still addicted to til' this day. 

This game is still an awesome experience, and even in 2020, I would still recommend picking this game up if you've never played it before. It's a great opportunity to experience a revolutionary game, and to still be amazed by how well this game holds up. Personally, I still don't think it visually looks that bad. 

 Before we get into this review, I would like to state that the following with be observed with considering both it's release date and the current date. !!!!THIS IS ALSO MY OPINION!!!!

Let's start.

[h1] HALF-LIFE [/h1]

[b] PRESENTATION 10/10 [/b]

 Absolutely classic. An easy to navigate HUD, a fantastic start to the game, and a load of wonderfully designed levels. Half-Life definitely set the bar for games to come.

[b] SOUND 8/10 [/b]

 The sound seems standard for it's time. Obviously, today it is far from even medium quality. It's not unbearably bad, but I think the sound is standard and fine for a game from the 90s.

[b] GAMEPLAY 10/10 [/b] 

 Extremely revolutionary. I can't use that word enough. This style of gameplay changed the world of FPS games forever. There is more to this game than running to rooms and killing monsters. You need to use your brain to get to the next level. Brilliant.

[b] GRAPHICS 10/10 [/b]

 I had to go back to games from 1998 and see how HL1 compared. Half-Life definitely blows the other games away with it's awesome detail and effects for it's time. I can't see how it could have looked any better for it's time. 

[b] LASTING APPEAL 10/10 [/b]

 People are still on. People still play though the game. It has an active speedrun community. Mods are still being developed. Critics still mention it. It has not and will never be forgotten. An absolute classic of a game!

[h1] 9.6/10 FOR THE BEST GAME EVER! [/h1]

Sorry to say it, but this game really wasn't very good. It started out exciting, but it became such a chore to play it that I would of rather done anything else to not play it. I haven't beat the game yet, but I've already resorted to no clipping just to avoid going through the same areas over and over again. It has cheap mechanics, game-breaking glitches (been stuck in a wall from turning a corner many times), and all the praise and overrating around it just for the game to fall flat on it's face with so many errors and boring gameplay was such a let down. 4/10

JiXXR REVIEW:

"Half Life. My first true gaming love. In my minds eye, you are this perfectly flawless experience that will forever be amongst my favorite of games. Although I have played through you again multiple times, you have yet to fail at being a fun and engaging experience."

Half Life takes you on an adventure unlike anything its predecessors had done before. There are no cutscenes, there are no loading screens. Everything happens in realtime, from your perspective, with full control over where you are and what you are seeing. This dynamic storytelling was a new concept and was something that really got your blood pumping. Rather than stepping away from the keyboard/controller and just watching, you were living this experience and controlling what happened. This is what makes Half Life so engaging and enjoyable.

In its day, Half Life was groundbreaking on a graphical scale as well. In comparison to today's games it looks flat, jittery, comically-badly animated, and the explosion sprites are laughable. With all that being said, visuals aren't everything and it is still a great experience. Don't go into this for the graphics, go into it for the nostalgia and fun!

The game is linear and there isn't much as far as options for completing it, but it has puzzle-like challenges that make you think a bit. Figuring out what button opens this or which tunnel you have to take to get to that is part of the challenge. Not extremely difficulty, but it breaks up the linear-ness of the game and keeps you engaged.

It's got a MOTHERFUCKING crowbar. That's right, you can bash in some headcrab zombies' skulls until you find yourself a .357 or machinegun. Even after finding a gun, I sometimes prefer to just continue to kill motherfuckers with the motherfucking crowbar.

All-in-all this is a great game. I would highly suggest playing through it. I got it with the bundle included with my 9600XT back in the day and it was definitely worth the video card upgrade.

~JiX

и т.д.

And yep, it's as good as people say. Nothing else needs to be said, really. If you're remotely interested in shooters or influential games you should play this.

Half-Life é um jogo desenvolvido e distribuído pela Valve Corporation, lançado em Novembro de 1998, jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa com uma temática de ficção científica.
  O jogo começa mostrando um dia comum no trabalho do protagonista, Gordon Freeman, quando um experimento dá errado e ele tem de passar por diversos desafios para fugir daquele local com vida.
 
 Prós:
  [list]
  [*]História rica em detalhes, a trama contada durante o decorrer do jogo é bem desenvolvida contendo diversos [i]plot twist[/i].
  [*]Cenário bem diversificado, todas as áreas em que o protagonista passa durante a trama são bem variados, contendo laboratórios, acampamentos militares, dimensões alternativas entre outros. 
  [*] Jogabilidade fluida, apesar de o jogo ser antigo, sua jogabilidade é boa levando em consideração a limitação tecnológica da época.
 [/list]

  Contras:
  [list]
[*]Bugs constantes, é comum diversos bugs serem identificados ao decorrer do jogo, em certos momentos inimigos somem, entram em paredes, os controles do personagem principal travam deixando o suicídio como única saída, NPCS essenciais para o prosseguimento não comprem seu objetivo, entre outros.
 [/list]

  Half-Life apresenta gráficos bons e uma jogabilidade fluida para sua época, que podem ser considerados ultrapassados nos dias de hoje, bugs constantes que prejudicam o jogador e uma dificuldade elevada para jogadores inexperientes, no entanto possuí uma história excelente, além de ser extremamente divertido.
  
  [b]Nota: 9,1[/b]

What can I say about Half-Life that hasn't already been said?
The game is absolutely great with a pretty interesting story. It has a lot of cool things in it and it was also the game that made FPS titles popular. It has some interesting dialogue and clever characters.  The graphics are pretty bad, but if you play this game then you're not playing it for the graphics!

Summary of the plot: You're playing as a middle-aged man named Gordon Freeman, a "mute" MIT graduate with a PhD in Theorectical Physics. During your first day in the shoes of Gordon Freeman everything starts going wrong during an experiment and beings from another world (Xen) start popping up everywhere out of thin air. Later on in the game you see the Marine trying to get rid of everyone who were part of the experiment, including you. The Marine and the "aliens" are (thankfully) your only threats in the game.

P.S. You might not want to play this game if you have trypophobia or claustrophobia!

Игра века

第一次接触HL是在2008年的暑假。我自己一个人，伴着窗外粘稠的蝉鸣，与电脑里不时传来的风扇转动和开门声，小心翼翼地在Black Mesa里前进。至少在那个夏天，我感觉自己仿佛就是Gordon Freeman。
一晃近十年过去了，在经历了十个小时的困难模式后，我第三次站在了列车传送门前。又一次的，在Gman的催促传来时，我踏进了那个绿色的光球。
我最喜欢玩的部分是进入Xen之前的内容，准确的说，是进入Lambda Core之前的内容。有时候我会在办公室区看着还正常发光的日光灯，听着风扇单调的声音愣神，有时候我会站在大战后的大坝上，想着刚刚还是直升机呼啸火炮齐鸣，现在天地只剩我一人好干净，空余足音。
是孤独吧，我想。那个夏天那个小男孩在青春期里第一次体会到了孤独，他自己的孤独，Gordon Freeman的孤独，深入灵魂里的，孤独。
我一直以为，人们心中的那些个好游戏，一定曾在他们心里留下过不可磨灭的印记。感谢HL陪我度过的那段岁月。
这是一款适合怀旧的游戏。愿诸君挥舞着撬棍前进时，依然能想起，那不曾褪色的青春。
dis geam iz creepy af

The last of the truly classic shooters. An intersection between the days of Quake/Unreal and those of Halo/Call of Duty. This game is in a league of it's own. 

While games such as System Shock took the fps genre and turned it on it's head, it was held back by overly-complex graphics and an inventory system that puts off first-time players. Half-Life kept it simple, while telling a meta-story. To fully appreciate this game, you must know the history of the genre, and how video games were percieved at the time.

Highly recommend.

This critically-acclaimed first-person shooter is widely considered the best of its genre. It was Valve’s first video game and ran on their first engine, and eventually led to the creation of the now-booming game distribution and social network you're using right now. The graphics are now somewhat outdated, but story and gameplay more than make up for it. There are many installments to the Half-Life series, a couple being Deathmatch and Episode Two, as well as the famous vaporware Half-Life 3. Overall, I’d say it’s significantly more than worth the price.

So. First day playing the game, trying to get to surface. There where the alien dog things, I shot all my ammo at them because they wanted to kill me. After I ran outta ammo I hid in a corner next to a dead body. 

10/10 Would hide next to dead body again. 

Other than the dead body thing, it's a great game, it even has some servers that people still join to.

El juego consta de 18 Capitulos, Mas el nivel de introduccion (que te enseña a jugar) y el Epilogo, Lo que serian 20 Niveles por asi decirlo.

El juego toma alrededor de 8 a 11 horas ganarlo por primera ves, a mi me llevo aproximadamente 10 siendo que nunca lo habia jugado.

Los graficos fueron tan originales para su epoca, que a pesar de que son "obsoletos" tecnologicamente hablando, No pasaron de moda, De mas esta decir, Que half life, dios vida a toda una generacion de Juegos de valve Increibles, con mapas, mods, campañas, y un casi infinito ETC que ofrece diversion de todo tipo y para toda la gente.

Si bien, los juegos mas viejos han muerto en su mayor parte, todavia se puede ver pequeños remanentes de gente jugando, A excepcion del Counter 1.6 que tiene una comunidad gigante.

Este juego tiene 2 Facetas, la multiplayer que como estoy comentando, No pasa sus mejores dias (aunque hay mucho contenido, pocos servidores y gente lo juegan, ademas que ya no es tan accesible como en el pasado, pero hay algunas paginas donde encontrar cientos de mapas, skins y personalizaciones, mods, etc).  Me gustaria encontrar mas pero no se mucho al respecto, aunque se que debe haberlos.

y La faceta Modo historia, Simplemente Excelente, Muy bien trabajada, los detalles cuidados, original, Atrapante, la musica bastante original aunque no se hace mucho uso de ella y hay muy poca (quizas el punto mas debil del juego y mas desaprovechado).

La musica la podes descargar gratis como DLC y el juego cuesta 7,49$ dolares, Yo recomiendo que no lo compre suelto, Sino que compre el pack de juegos de valve, ya que sin descuento vale casi 73$ dolares, lo cual es una ganga, al lado de juegos que valen 60$ dolares o mas y solo tienen 8 o 10 horas de contenido para jugar, por 73 Dolares usted tiene todos los juegos de valve y facil unas 100 a 200 horas de contenido garantizado, sin contar multiplayer y rejugabilidad.

Agrego a lo dicho anteriormente: Este juego tiene casi 19 años, Por lo cual los requisitos para jugarlo, son practicamente nulos, anda en cualquier Computadora de hoy con graficos maximos (tiene pocas opciones para disminuir y aumentar graficos, pero realmente el consumo es insignificante, asi que si tu ordenador no puede correr muchos juegos, este lo hace andar como si fuera un ferrari).
Doom, ale w reżyserii Denisa Villeneuve. Polecam dla wystrzeliwania rządowych rakiet i strzelania w gigantyczne telepatyczne płody.

Klasyk...

Dawno, dawno temu...

...przypadkiem odkryłem tą grę (po prostu ktoś ze znajomych miał ją wypaloną na CD) i z czasem zrozumiałem, że to istna perełka! - niemy bohater (cecha ciekawa bo ułatwia graczowi wczuć się w postać Freeman'a), bardzo okrojona fabuła (opowiedziana w bardzo długich misjach), brak jakichkolwiek przerywników (od początku do końca patrzymy na wszystko oczami bohatera i wszystko dzieje się w jednym odcinku czasu) oraz wyzywające pojedynki z wrogimi żołnierzami oraz z istotami z innego wymiaru (sprawiają one, że gracz czuje satysfakcję po każdej wygranej bitwie)...

Grę polecam bo to klasyk, legenda, przygoda, strzelanka z kosmitami, miejsce narodzin Headcrabów i G-Man'a i przede wszystkim, ponieważ to bardzo dobry FPS.
Do not let the outdated graphics fool you this game is better than most modern titles.... while it feels a little different than modern games it is still very good

A storied classic, artistically maybe better than the sequel, Half-Life is the perfect mid-point between Quake and the open-world boom, almost impeccably marrying bombastic shooter gameplay and intuitive puzzle and backtrack design with a linear but consistent world that almost feels real...at least as much as one could at the time. Hitting that sweet spot between realistic level design and gameplay-based level design, Half-Life holds up. Except for the Xen levels.
Tej gry nie trzeba recenzować...

Well, what can I say. Half-Life is without a doubt one of the greatest PC games ever created. It's legacy is revolutionary. Everything about this game is near perfect, and if the graphics put you off there is the source engine version and the acclaimed Black Mesa mod. If you want to jump onto the hype train for the illusive Half-Life 3 there is no better place to start.

I'll keep it brief since there's not much I can say that hasn't been said. Game still holds up pretty well today, with solid levels and lots of combat options. Story is interesting enough and sound is cool too. I will say the game drags a bit near the end and the final boss is frankly obnoxious to fight but apart from that it's worth a play.

This game makes me scream with how awesome it is. I love the story, the gameplay and everything about it! This game has strangely gave me a sense of optimism...Think of it like this. Wether you're a scientist in a bright orange ♥♥♥ suit smashing Crowbars into the faces of Alien Monsters. Climbing slowly out of the hell of a hidden government facility. To a poor secuity guard blowing holes in military cover up soldiers trying to kill him when all he wants to do to is live a comfortable life. Or perhaps a Military Cover up agent stepping into something you have no idea off and fighting a new war you've never trained for. This game makes you feel like a badass and makes you feel like you actually get some where. I IMPLORE YOU to buy these games. Nothing but good things to say about these games.

Probabilmente il miglior sparatutto mai fatto, insieme al suo secondo capitolo, Half Life è storia, capostipite di decine e decine di videogiochi che hanno attinto alle sue idee e al suo gameplay. Giocato nel 2016, è ancora oggi decisamente piacevole da giocare, sia per il feeling delle armi, sia per la storia, sia per gli ambienti di gioco; considerando che ha quasi 20 anni è più che un capolavoro. Must have!
